A FOUNDERS AND CODERS PROJECT

Facebook Twitter LinkedIn Youtube Pinterest

Portfolio

A collection of projects from the seven week Founders & Coders course @ Collective Academy.

  • All
  • Projects
  • Tutorials

  • Guardian API

  • Twitter API

  • Learn you NodeJs

  • Data-Driven Documents

  • Liquid template with Jekyll

Founders & Coders is a course run by Dan Sofer and Pastor Jurado. The aim is to take a small group of highly motivated students and provide them with a world class education, with as little cost as possible.

No Fee

The course is free. Our philosophy is to create value in our buisness by creating value in our students, whether they join us in other projects, or help us get sponsorship from the industry.

High Intensity

Students are expected to reach a level of competence that would allow them to work as a junior developer, or start work on their own project. Natural aptitude is welcome. Enthusiasm and hard work are a requirement.

Group Learning

Borrowing from the ideas of Richard Felder and Sugata Mitra, this course is built on a philosophy of group learning through ambitious, open ended, projects.



About us

Meet The Team

BTeam is made up of three students, from the Summer 2014 Founders & Coders course. This website is a showcases of our work over the seven week duration.

    Brian Guinan
    CEO

    Professional cardsmith. Two-time-world-champion-speed-talker.

  • Facebook Twitter LinkedIn Youtube

    Code monster

    Does not sleep. Does not eat. Knows no pain
